Start OpenRAM

Git Clone the Source

git clone git://

Show Current Directory Address

pwd

Export Environment Varibles

export OPENRAM_HOME=”$HOME/openram/compiler”

export OPENRAM_TECH=”$HOME/openram/technology”

Note: it’s OpenRAM not openram
